While it has a distinctive taste, it's not as zesty as some other flavored sodas or carbonated beverages. It has a recognizable flavor profile that includes a mix of sweetness and carbonation, but it doesn't have the intense, complex flavors of some other zesty drinks. Given its popularity and recognizable taste, I would place it closer to the zesty side, but not entirely. So, I believe it sits around 40 on the spectrum.
